who participated in battle are prohibited from being used again in the same quest."},{"lineNumber":260394,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260395,"originalJapaneseLine":"２つ","translatedEnglishLine":"2."},{"lineNumber":260396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　経験値も入らない、宝箱も出ない","translatedEnglishLine":"No this,"},{"lineNumber":260409,"originalJapaneseLine":"クエストクリアしましたという印的な物になります","translatedEnglishLine":"it serves as a mark that indicates the quest has been cleared."},{"lineNumber":260410,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが３超神か女神アリスに裁判される風で","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s set up like Kurukku is being judged by the three Super Gods or Goddess Alice."},{"lineNumber":260411,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくつかの裏設定の解説を行う","translatedEnglishLine":"It explains some of the behind-the-scenes ago."},{"lineNumber":260413,"originalJapaneseLine":"・エールの正体、冒険の意味","translatedEnglishLine":"- The true identity of Ale and the meaning of the adventure."},{"lineNumber":260414,"originalJapaneseLine":"・最期に恒久的に干渉権を奪う事に成功","translatedEnglishLine":"- Ultimately succeeding in permanently seizing the right to intervene."},{"lineNumber":260415,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックー裁判以外のネタ解説","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanations of other references besides Kurukku’s trial."},{"lineNumber":260416,"originalJapaneseLine":"コーラ、ＫＤとかでもいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe Cola, KD, or others would be fine too."},{"lineNumber":260417,"originalJapaneseLine":"細かい事はまだ未定","translatedEnglishLine":"The details are still undecided."},{"lineNumber":260418,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の居るＣＩＴＹからスタート","translatedEnglishLine":"Starts from the CITY where Rance and the others are."},{"lineNumber":260419,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここから自由都市連合本部のあるＭランドへ向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"From here, heading toward M Land, the headquarters of the Free City Union."},{"lineNumber":260420,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンが同行","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon accompanies them."},{"lineNumber":260421,"originalJapaneseLine":"このあたりは魔軍の勢力圏になので突っ切る事に","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is under the demon army’s sphere of influence, so they decide to cut through it."},{"lineNumber":260422,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：自由都市平原","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Free City Plains."},{"lineNumber":260423,"originalJapaneseLine":"移動中の会話、キャンプでもいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversations during travel; camping is also fine."},{"lineNumber":260424,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンによる自由都市連合の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon’s explanation of the Free City Union."},{"lineNumber":260425,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市とは、７大国、国家連合、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free City refers to: the Seven Great Nations, National Unions,"},{"lineNumber":260426,"originalJapaneseLine":"新興国で発言力低いねん、議長なんやけどなサイフ扱いや（日本みたいな立場）","translatedEnglishLine":"They are emerging countries with little influence, though they act as chairmen, treated like wallets (a position similar to Japan)."},{"lineNumber":260427,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっぴり愚痴","translatedEnglishLine":"A little bit of a complaint."},{"lineNumber":260428,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍の様子、レッドの町周辺に展開している","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army’s situation: deployed around the town of Red."},{"lineNumber":260429,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ピサロが率いる第３軍、現在の総兵力ＸＸ万","translatedEnglishLine":"The 3rd army led by Monster General Pizarro, current total strength: XX ten-thousands."},{"lineNumber":260430,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイ、魔人パイアールも参加している","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon men Rey and Paiar are also participating."},{"lineNumber":260431,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのピサロと太鼓持ちのコンバートの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation between Pizarro and his flatterer Convert."},{"lineNumber":260432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分に与えられた兵は他方面と比べて少なく、不満","translatedEnglishLine":"He is dissatisfied because the troops assigned to him are fewer compared to other fronts."},{"lineNumber":260433,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこで考えたのが、人間の裏切りを誘発して使う事","translatedEnglishLine":"What he thought of was to induce betrayal in humans and use them."},{"lineNumber":260434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コンバートはその為にいる、支配した人間国の管理官としての地位","translatedEnglishLine":"Convert exists for that purpose, holding the position of administrator of the controlled human nations."},{"lineNumber":260435,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間はいずれ魔軍の奴隷となる、避けられぬ運命だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans will eventually become slaves of the demon army; it is an inevitable fate."},{"lineNumber":260436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前達の中で我々に協力し成果をあげた者を管理者にしてやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Among you, those who cooperate with us and achieve results will be made administrators."},{"lineNumber":260437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間から魔物となり、私と共に下等な人間共を支配するエリートとしていだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They will become monsters from humans and, together with me, rule as elites over the inferior humans."},{"lineNumber":260438,"originalJapaneseLine":"　名誉魔物的な立場だなとか","translatedEnglishLine":"A position like an honorary monster, or so forth."},{"lineNumber":260439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コンバートはニコニコ、まかしてくださいと","translatedEnglishLine":"Convert smiles and says, 'Leave it to me.'"},{"lineNumber":260440,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の方面と違い、ここは都市国家の連合体、切り崩しは楽ですぜ","translatedEnglishLine":"Unlike other fronts, this is an alliance of city-states, so breaking it apart is easy."},{"lineNumber":260441,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラによる魔人パイアールの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information on demon man Paiar by Satera."},{"lineNumber":260442,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか不思議な物ばかり作る奴、よく分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"He makes only strange things; hard to understand."},{"lineNumber":260443,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラのガーディアと違って、つまんないのを作るロボットとかＰＤとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Unlike Satera’s Gardia, he creates boring things like robots or PDs."},{"lineNumber":260444,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピューターとかも作ったとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He even made computers or something like that."},{"lineNumber":260445,"originalJapaneseLine":"うざいガキ","translatedEnglishLine":"An annoying kid."},{"lineNumber":260446,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、奴が作るロボットはやっかいのも多い","translatedEnglishLine":"However, many of the robots he makes are troublesome."},{"lineNumber":260447,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラによる魔人レイの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information on demon man Rey by Satera."},{"lineNumber":260448,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t素行不良、ホーネット様とは合わない、サテラとも合わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Bad behavior; doesn’t get along with Lord Hornet or with Satera."},{"lineNumber":260449,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t常に何か怒っている、不満があるのか、ガキみたいな奴","translatedEnglishLine":"Always angry about something; maybe has complaints; a brat-like guy."},{"lineNumber":260450,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t部下もうまく使えていない、組織力はほんどない","translatedEnglishLine":"He doesn’t use his subordinates well; has almost no organizational skills."},{"lineNumber":260451,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、強さは本物、雷撃系の技を使う","translatedEnglishLine":"However, his strength is genuine; he uses lightning-based techniques."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １つ
戦闘に参加したキャラは同クエスト中は使用禁止になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Characters who participated in battle are prohibited from being used again in the same quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２つ
経験値も入らない、宝箱も出ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No experience points are gained, and no treasure chests appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３つ
自動戦闘は発生しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Automatic battle will not occur.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [お任せ下さい] [サボり厳禁]
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Leave it to me] [No slacking allowed]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４つ
勝てなくても無理しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t overdo it even if you can't win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリスの館
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice's Mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト達成おめでとうーパチパチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Congratulations on completing the quest—*applause*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アフターの全バトル挑戦クエストの最期に出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appears at the end of all battle challenge quests in After.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストリザルト画面が無いので、これを出す事で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since there is no quest result screen, by showing this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストクリアしましたという印的な物になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it serves as a mark that indicates the quest has been cleared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが３超神か女神アリスに裁判される風で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s set up like Kurukku is being judged by the three Super Gods or Goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつかの裏設定の解説を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It explains some of the behind-the-scenes lore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・１５年前のクルックーとルドラサウムの約束
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The promise between Kurukku and Rudrasaum from 15 years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・エールの正体、冒険の意味
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The true identity of Ale and the meaning of the adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・最期に恒久的に干渉権を奪う事に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Ultimately succeeding in permanently seizing the right to intervene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー裁判以外のネタ解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanations of other references besides Kurukku’s trial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コーラ、ＫＤとかでもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe Cola, KD, or others would be fine too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい事はまだ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The details are still undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の居るＣＩＴＹからスタート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starts from the CITY where Rance and the others are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから自由都市連合本部のあるＭランドへ向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here, heading toward M Land, the headquarters of the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンが同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりは魔軍の勢力圏になので突っ切る事に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is under the demon army’s sphere of influence, so they decide to cut through it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：自由都市平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Free City Plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話、キャンプでもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations during travel; camping is also fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンによる自由都市連合の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon’s explanation of the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市とは、７大国、国家連合、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free City refers to: the Seven Great Nations, National Unions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新興国で発言力低いねん、議長なんやけどなサイフ扱いや（日本みたいな立場）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are emerging countries with little influence, though they act as chairmen, treated like wallets (a position similar to Japan).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっぴり愚痴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little bit of a complaint.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍の様子、レッドの町周辺に展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army’s situation: deployed around the town of Red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロが率いる第３軍、現在の総兵力ＸＸ万
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 3rd army led by Monster General Pizarro, current total strength: XX ten-thousands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、魔人パイアールも参加している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon men Rey and Paiar are also participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのピサロと太鼓持ちのコンバートの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation between Pizarro and his flatterer Convert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分に与えられた兵は他方面と比べて少なく、不満
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is dissatisfied because the troops assigned to him are fewer compared to other fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで考えたのが、人間の裏切りを誘発して使う事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What he thought of was to induce betrayal in humans and use them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバートはその為にいる、支配した人間国の管理官としての地位
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert exists for that purpose, holding the position of administrator of the controlled human nations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間はいずれ魔軍の奴隷となる、避けられぬ運命だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans will eventually become slaves of the demon army; it is an inevitable fate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達の中で我々に協力し成果をあげた者を管理者にしてやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among you, those who cooperate with us and achieve results will be made administrators.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間から魔物となり、私と共に下等な人間共を支配するエリートとしていだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will become monsters from humans and, together with me, rule as elites over the inferior humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名誉魔物的な立場だなとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A position like an honorary monster, or so forth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバートはニコニコ、まかしてくださいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert smiles and says, 'Leave it to me.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の方面と違い、ここは都市国家の連合体、切り崩しは楽ですぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike other fronts, this is an alliance of city-states, so breaking it apart is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人パイアールの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information on demon man Paiar by Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか不思議な物ばかり作る奴、よく分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He makes only strange things; hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラのガーディアと違って、つまんないのを作るロボットとかＰＤとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike Satera’s Gardia, he creates boring things like robots or PDs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターとかも作ったとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He even made computers or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざいガキ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An annoying kid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、奴が作るロボットはやっかいのも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, many of the robots he makes are troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人レイの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information on demon man Rey by Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素行不良、ホーネット様とは合わない、サテラとも合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bad behavior; doesn’t get along with Lord Hornet or with Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に何か怒っている、不満があるのか、ガキみたいな奴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always angry about something; maybe has complaints; a brat-like guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下もうまく使えていない、組織力はほんどない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn’t use his subordinates well; has almost no organizational skills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、強さは本物、雷撃系の技を使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, his strength is genuine; he uses lightning-based techniques.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １つ
戦闘に参加したキャラは同クエスト中は使用禁止になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Characters who participated in battle are prohibited from being used again in the same quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２つ
経験値も入らない、宝箱も出ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No experience points are gained, and no treasure chests appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３つ
自動戦闘は発生しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Automatic battle will not occur.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [お任せ下さい] [サボり厳禁]
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Leave it to me] [No slacking allowed]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４つ
勝てなくても無理しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t overdo it even if you can't win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリスの館
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice's Mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト達成おめでとうーパチパチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Congratulations on completing the quest—*applause*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アフターの全バトル挑戦クエストの最期に出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appears at the end of all battle challenge quests in After.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストリザルト画面が無いので、これを出す事で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since there is no quest result screen, by showing this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエストクリアしましたという印的な物になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it serves as a mark that indicates the quest has been cleared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが３超神か女神アリスに裁判される風で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s set up like Kurukku is being judged by the three Super Gods or Goddess Alice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつかの裏設定の解説を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It explains some of the behind-the-scenes lore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・１５年前のクルックーとルドラサウムの約束
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The promise between Kurukku and Rudrasaum from 15 years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・エールの正体、冒険の意味
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The true identity of Ale and the meaning of the adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・最期に恒久的に干渉権を奪う事に成功
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Ultimately succeeding in permanently seizing the right to intervene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー裁判以外のネタ解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanations of other references besides Kurukku’s trial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コーラ、ＫＤとかでもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe Cola, KD, or others would be fine too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい事はまだ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The details are still undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の居るＣＩＴＹからスタート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starts from the CITY where Rance and the others are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから自由都市連合本部のあるＭランドへ向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here, heading toward M Land, the headquarters of the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンが同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりは魔軍の勢力圏になので突っ切る事に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is under the demon army’s sphere of influence, so they decide to cut through it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：自由都市平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Free City Plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話、キャンプでもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations during travel; camping is also fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンによる自由都市連合の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon’s explanation of the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市とは、７大国、国家連合、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free City refers to: the Seven Great Nations, National Unions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新興国で発言力低いねん、議長なんやけどなサイフ扱いや（日本みたいな立場）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are emerging countries with little influence, though they act as chairmen, treated like wallets (a position similar to Japan).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっぴり愚痴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little bit of a complaint.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍の様子、レッドの町周辺に展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army’s situation: deployed around the town of Red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロが率いる第３軍、現在の総兵力ＸＸ万
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 3rd army led by Monster General Pizarro, current total strength: XX ten-thousands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、魔人パイアールも参加している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon men Rey and Paiar are also participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのピサロと太鼓持ちのコンバートの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation between Pizarro and his flatterer Convert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分に与えられた兵は他方面と比べて少なく、不満
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is dissatisfied because the troops assigned to him are fewer compared to other fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで考えたのが、人間の裏切りを誘発して使う事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What he thought of was to induce betrayal in humans and use them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバートはその為にいる、支配した人間国の管理官としての地位
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert exists for that purpose, holding the position of administrator of the controlled human nations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間はいずれ魔軍の奴隷となる、避けられぬ運命だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans will eventually become slaves of the demon army; it is an inevitable fate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達の中で我々に協力し成果をあげた者を管理者にしてやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among you, those who cooperate with us and achieve results will be made administrators.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間から魔物となり、私と共に下等な人間共を支配するエリートとしていだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will become monsters from humans and, together with me, rule as elites over the inferior humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名誉魔物的な立場だなとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A position like an honorary monster, or so forth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバートはニコニコ、まかしてくださいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert smiles and says, 'Leave it to me.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の方面と違い、ここは都市国家の連合体、切り崩しは楽ですぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike other fronts, this is an alliance of city-states, so breaking it apart is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人パイアールの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information on demon man Paiar by Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか不思議な物ばかり作る奴、よく分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He makes only strange things; hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラのガーディアと違って、つまんないのを作るロボットとかＰＤとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike Satera’s Gardia, he creates boring things like robots or PDs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターとかも作ったとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He even made computers or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざいガキ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An annoying kid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、奴が作るロボットはやっかいのも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, many of the robots he makes are troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人レイの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information on demon man Rey by Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素行不良、ホーネット様とは合わない、サテラとも合わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bad behavior; doesn’t get along with Lord Hornet or with Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に何か怒っている、不満があるのか、ガキみたいな奴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always angry about something; maybe has complaints; a brat-like guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下もうまく使えていない、組織力はほんどない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn’t use his subordinates well; has almost no organizational skills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、強さは本物、雷撃系の技を使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, his strength is genuine; he uses lightning-based techniques.
